review: We have only had this for a couple of weeks, it is a bandwidth hig for sure, but still worth the price.
author: Lin Pearce

review: Great. Easy to install. No problems.
author: Mimi

review: It works great and it's easy to use
author: saul

review: I've searched the movies and loved several of them so far. Due to my work schedule I've only been able to watch one movie that a friend recommended.  I'll enjoy more this weekend when I have time off.  The installation instructions were very easy to follow and I'm so glad I finally  purchased the Fire TV Stick.  Thank you Amazon!!!
author: Jerlean Stricklin

review: Exactly what I needed to watch TV without cable or satellite!
author: Holly

review: I was watching a TV Series Downton Abby and now it doesn't allow me to watch the next season.  I get messages to purchase Prime...has my subscription expire?
author: Jennifer Topash "tjavajen"

review: great service, nice unit. we got the optional remote for doing voice searches & it works really well out of the box. we're not gamers so we got the Stick. glad we did. well worth it
author: Terrence P Gallagher

review: Much smoother an faster than any alternative.
author: Benjamin Larrabee
